member.name: D3D12_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER
member.summary: Debug message filter; contains a lists of message types to allow or deny.

member.name: D3D12_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER.AllowList
member.summary: Specifies types of messages that you want to allow. See .

member.name: D3D12_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER.DenyList
member.summary: Specifies types of messages that you want to deny.
